programme.title: Obscenity and public art funding
programme.short_synopsis: The struggle of the National Endowment for the Arts to spend public money wisely.
programme.medium_synopsis: Controversy over public art funding in the US, the struggles of the National Endowment for the Arts and the history of attempts to protect the public from obscenity.
programme.long_synopsis: Controversy over public art funding in the US, the struggles of the National Endowment for the Arts and the history of attempts to protect the public from obscenity.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
